00022 /*! \file RawQWorkflow.h This file provides the ability to compute a RawQ value from a CEL file. */
00023 
00024 #ifndef _RAWQ_WORKFLOW_HEADER_
00025 #define _RAWQ_WORKFLOW_HEADER_
00026 
00027 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00028 
00029 #include "rawq/src/RawQ.h"
00030 //
00031 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCDFData.h"
00032 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCELData.h"
00033 //
00034 
00035 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00036 
00037 /*! This class provides interfaces to compute the RawQ value from a CEL file. */
00038 class CRawQWorkflow
00039 {
00040 public:
00041         /*! The error codes for the RawQ function. */
00042         typedef enum {
00043                 NoError,
00044                 UnableToReadCELFile,
00045                 UnableToReadCDFFile,
00046                 NotExpressionArray
00047         } RawQError;
00048 
00049 protected:
00050         /*! The probe array type. */
00051         std::string m_ArrayType;
00052 
00053         /*! The CDF file object. */
00054         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCDFData m_Cdf;
00055 
00056         /*! The CEL file object. */
00057         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData m_Cel;
00058 
00059         /*! The computed RawQ value. */
00060         float m_RawQ;
00061 
00062         /*! The RawQ algorithm interfaces. */
00063         CRawQ m_RawQAlg;
00064 
00065         /*! Reads the CEL file into memory.
00066          * @param celFile The name of the CEL file.
00067          * @return True if sucessful.
00068          */
00069         bool ReadCELFile(const char *celFile);
00070 
00071         /*! Reads the CDF file into memory.
00072          * @param libPath The path to the CDF files.
00073          * @return True if sucessful.
00074          */
00075         bool LoadCDFFile(const char *libPath);
00076 
00077         /*! Checks that the files are of the right tile type.
00078          * @return True if the array type is an expression array type.
00079          */
00080         bool IsExpressionArray();
00081 
00082 public:
00083         /*! Constructor */
00084         CRawQWorkflow();
00085 
00086         /*! Destructor */
00087         ~CRawQWorkflow();
00088 
00089         /*! Resets the default parameters. */
00090         void SetDefaults() { m_RawQAlg.SetDefaults(); }
00091 
00092         /*! Sets the number of vertical zones to use.
00093          * @param v The number of vertical zones for the background calculation.
00094          */
00095         void SetVerticalZones(int v) { m_RawQAlg.SetVerticalZones(v); }
00096 
00097         /*! Sets the number of horizontal zones to use.
00098          * @param h The number of horizontal zones for the background calculation.
00099          */
00100         void SetHorizontalZones(int h) { m_RawQAlg.SetHorizontalZones(h); }
00101 
00102         /*! Sets the percentage of background probes to use in each zone.
00103          * @param p The percent of probes to use for the background calculation.
00104          */
00105         void SetPercentBG(float p) { m_RawQAlg.SetPercentBG(p); }
00106 
00107         /*! Gets the number of vertical zones to use.
00108          * @return The number of vertical zones for the background calculation.
00109          */
00110         int GetVerticalZones() const { return  m_RawQAlg.GetVerticalZones(); }
00111 
00112         /*! Gets the number of horizontal zones to use.
00113          * @return The number of horizontal zones for the background calculation.
00114          */
00115         int GetHorizontalZones() const { return  m_RawQAlg.GetHorizontalZones(); }
00116 
00117         /*! Gets the percentage of background probes to use in each zone.
00118          * @return The percent of probes to use for the background calculation.
00119          */
00120         float GetPercentBG() const { return  m_RawQAlg.GetPercentBG(); }
00121 
00122         /*! Clear memory associated with the class. */
00123         void Clear();
00124 
00125         /*! Calculates the RawQ value.
00126          * @param celFile The full path of the CEL file.
00127          * @param libPath The path to where the CDF files live.
00128          * @return The status of the calculation.
00129          */
00130         RawQError ComputeRawQ(const char *celFile, const char *libPath);
00131 
00132         /*! Gets the RawQ value.
00133          * @return The RawQ value.
00134          */
00135         float GetRawQ() { return m_RawQ; }
00136 };
